DOC.brief_summary: Study factor explain Health-Related Quality Life ( HRQL ) patient Alzheimer disease include : - The influence environment ( physical human ) Health-Related Quality Life ( HRQL ) , - The influence non-drug drug treatment Health-Related Quality Life ( HRQL ) , - The influence formal informal help mobilize , - The influence interaction `` patient - caregiver '' Health-Related Quality Life ( HRQL ) , - The influence ratio necessary cost available resource Health-Related Quality Life ( HRQL )
DOC.brief_title: Determinants Quality Life Related Health Alzheimer Disease
DOC.criteria: Patients Alzheimer disease ( DSM IV NINCDSADRDA ) Patients MMSE ( Mini Mental State Examination ) > = 10 Out patient Severe sensory disturbance , Non French speaking
